TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Qapedang, title = Qapedang, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Qapedang} }

S.FORM: Qapedang i Pingtung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Qapedang. u kasalumaluma' nu Qapedang sa, 308 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 1,146 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 1,119 ku tademaw, pakalatu 98%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 27 ku tademaw, pakalatu 2%. u kasabinacadan, Paiwan 94%, Bunun 1%, Amis 1%, zumazuma 1%.

Qapedang i Pingtong a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Qapedang. o kasalomaloma' no Qapedang sa, 308 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 1,146 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 1,119 ko tademaw, pakalato 98%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 27 ko tademaw, pakalato 2%. o kasabinacadan, Paiwan 94%, Bonon 1%, Amis 1%, zomazoma 1%.
